main.name: THEYTAZ Benjamin
main.bio: I am passionate about new technologies in particular related to artificial intelligence, image processing and computer science. I try to learn as much as possible about the deployment of artificial intelligence solutions (docker, kubernetes, and cloud), their software architecture and AI frameworks.

education.degree: Master of Signal Processing: Embedded systems for signal, image and sound processing
education.description: This course aims to train specialists in software and hardware architecture for signal processing and more particularly for image processing. For this, the initial knowledge base is primarily centered on digital electronics and embedded computing. The second year of the master allows a specialization towards systems dedicated to image processing (FPGA, DSP), as well as a solid training in image processing and artificial vision.  In the end, the core of the professions targeted by the SETSIS course concerns the development of embedded architecture on reconfigurable targets (FPGA) for real-time image processing which, according to OPIIEC (observatory of digital, engineering, research and consulting professions), is one of the skills most sought after by professionals.

education.degree: Bachelor's degree in Applied Physics and Engineering: Electronics, Electrical Engineering and Automation.
education.description: The objective of this course is to give students a field of knowledge and skills related to the various disciplines of EEA, through theoretical and experimental learning (analog, digital and power electronics, metrology, signal processing, servo systems, electromagnetism ...).

education.degree: Technological University Diploma in Physical Measurements
education.description: The DUT in Physical Measurements trains highly qualified and versatile senior technicians who prepare and carry out measurements. They have the knowledge and skills to design and implement a test or inspection protocol for industrial applications (automotive, aeronautics, space, electronics, optics, materials, chemistry, pharmaceuticals, energy, agri-food, biomedical, environment, etc.), analysis laboratories, design offices or research and development departments.

work.title: Computer Vision Engineer
work.description: Participate in the development of technical solutions on aspects of computer vision and artificial intelligence for fruits phenotyping and analysis. Creation of a graphical interface (Qt) and a multi-threaded program for an image acquisition system. Creation of a framework based on a micro-service architecture (with docker) deployed in the cloud (GCP) to analyse features and faults on several types of fruits (Image analysis with Opencv and Tensorflow).

projects.title: Face Detection
projects.category: Face detection with camera tracking using a Pan/Tilt turret

projects.title: Home fire detector
projects.category: Fire detection in domestic environments with YoloV3 (DeepLearning)

testimonials.text: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
